prompt: Take this photo of me and turn me into a collectible figurine inside a toy box. Include a clear window, bold packaging graphics, my name on the box, glossy resin texture, realistic likeness, studio product lighting, high-res photoreal finish.
comment: Viral #1 trend—widely shared example in Tom's Guide and many how‑tos for Nano Banana collectible edits.

prompt: Transform this portrait into an anime hero: vibrant manga color palette, dramatic cinematic lighting, dynamic action pose, crisp linework, maintain identity and facial features.
comment: Top viral prompt from multiple 'top 10' lists (YouTube/viral threads) making anime avatars hugely popular.

prompt: Create a cyberpunk portrait from this photo: neon city background, reflective goggles, glowing accents, rain-soaked streets, high‑contrast cinematic lighting, photoreal detail.

prompt: Turn this image into a realistic astronaut portrait: authentic NASA-style suit, cosmic galaxy backdrop, helmet reflections, cinematic rim lighting, photoreal finish.

prompt: Recreate this subject as a 16-bit video game character and place them in a classic 2D platform level: pixel art sprite, limited palette, retro UI and background, crisp outlines.

prompt: Redraw this photo in Studio Ghibli style: soft painterly backgrounds, warm cinematic lighting, hand-painted textures, expressive eyes, keep identity and pose consistent.

prompt: Reshape the body of the person in [Image1] into a [target body type]. Keep the face, identity, hairstyle, and clothing consistent. Ensure realistic anatomy, natural proportions, and photorealistic details.

prompt: Place me into Vincent van Gogh's 'Starry Night' (or other classic painting): render me in the original style's brushwork, colors and texture so I blend seamlessly, no text.

prompt: Generate an image of the same scene as [Image1], but showing how it looks 10 minutes later. Keep environment and style consistent; add natural changes in light, weather, and people for photoreal continuity.
